version_description:
Meet the all-new PDF Expert 6!
We believe this is the best PDF editor for your iPhone and iPad. Ever.
Here’s why:

**Edit PDF text, images and links**

We’ve added a unique superpower that allows you to edit PDFs. Do things nobody else can!
- Edit and modify PDF text;
- Add and replace images;
- Add links to text and pictures;
- Hide sensitive information using Redact feature.

*PDF editing comes as an additional in-app purchase.

**New Design **
A completely new design brings an amazing experience when adding and managing files in PDF Expert.

You make fewer taps in order to edit, zip, tag, move or sync files. Bigger file preview thumbnails give you a better idea of the content of that Excel spreadsheet or PPT presentation.
A new prominent “+” button allows you to quickly and easily import files, including documents from your computer, Dropbox, or any other source.

**Work in the cloud**
With PDF Expert 6 you can work on the fly in the cloud. If you edit, annotate or sign documents in Dropbox using PDF Expert, all edits are saved right there without downloading the document.
The cloud sync speed is improved for Google Drive, Box and OneDrive. You can work with PDFs, and we take care of the rest. It just works.

Wait, there’s more.
**Password protection** - You can protect specific PDFs that contain sensitive data with a password.
**Enhanced search** - Finding a word or a document is super easy since you can search through multiple documents and file types.
**Edit Outlines** - Outlines are great when you are working on a huge document to structure your data. You can easily edit an outline in a few clicks.

Readdle team has been working diligently on this for over a year to give you the best PDF experience on your iPhone and iPad. We truly hope that you will enjoy the new version.

+ Numerous bug fixes and general performance improvements;
+ Drag and Drop compatibility with other Readdle apps on iPad*.
(Works with Documents, Spark and Scanner Pro)

*iPad Pro, iPad Air 2 and iPad mini 4

Thank you for using PDF Expert 6! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

+ Numerous bug fixes and general performance improvements;
+ Drag and Drop compatibility with other Readdle apps on iPad*.
(Works with Documents, Spark and Scanner Pro)

*iPad Pro, iPad Air 2 and iPad mini 4

Thank you for using PDF Expert 6! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

We’re constantly working to make PDF Expert 6 better for you. Here what’s new in this version:

- Full support of iPad Pro 10.5;
- General performance and stability improvements.

Here at Readdle, we are building the “future of work” ecosystem of apps and services that take your productivity to the next level. Check out readdle.com for more.
Thank you for using PDF Expert 6! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

We’re constantly working to make PDF Expert 6 better for you. Here what’s new in this version:

- Full support of iPad Pro 10.5;
- General performance and stability improvements.

Here at Readdle, we are building the “future of work” ecosystem of apps and services that take your productivity to the next level. Check out readdle.com for more.
Thank you for using PDF Expert 6! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

PDF Expert gets a custom integration with Readdle’s email client – Spark.
Now you can easily open PDF attachments from Spark in PDF Expert, edit and sign them, and reply with just one tap. The Spark + PDF Expert combo is an example of a best in class cross-app integration to help you fill invoices, sign agreements and insertion orders.

This is the first step towards Readdle’s global effort in creating a single productivity ecosystem for you. Stay tuned, more to come!

We’re constantly working to make PDF Expert 6 better for you. Here what’s new in this version:

– General performance and stability improvements.

Here at Readdle, we are building the “future of work” ecosystem of apps and services that take your productivity to the next level. Check out readdle.com for more.
Thank you for using PDF Expert 6! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

PDF Expert gets amazing iOS 11 updates and now supports the new Drag and Drop on iPad!

What’s new?
– Drop email attachments from Spark into PDF Expert. Edit, sign and send them back;
– Drop text from any app to add a new paragraph or text annotations to your PDFs;
– Drag and Drop images from Safari to create a new page, or to add images to an existing page;
– Drag PDFs from email, Files app, etc. to merge with files in PDF Expert.

BONUS: This update brings a super powerful integration of PDF Expert and our Scanner Pro. Now you can scan papers, bills and documents without leaving PDF Expert.

Now PDF Expert and other Readdle’s apps like Spark, Documents, Scanner Pro, Calendars and Printer Pro are one step closer to a powerful ecosystem that redefines what is possible on your Apple devices.

PDF Expert gets amazing iOS 11 updates and now supports the new Drag and Drop on iPad!

What’s new?
– Drop email attachments from Spark into PDF Expert. Edit, sign and send them back;
– Drop text from any app to add a new paragraph or text annotations to your PDFs;
– Drag and Drop images from Safari to create a new page, or to add images to an existing page;
– Drag PDFs from email, Files app, etc. to merge with files in PDF Expert.

BONUS: This update brings a super powerful integration of PDF Expert and our Scanner Pro. Now you can scan papers, bills and documents without leaving PDF Expert.

Now PDF Expert and other Readdle’s apps like Spark, Documents, Scanner Pro, Calendars and Printer Pro are one step closer to a powerful ecosystem that redefines what is possible on your Apple devices.

Our team is working hard to make PDF Expert better for you. In this update you'll find:
General performance and stability improvements.

In this update:
- Added the Rename feature for opened tabs in PDF Viewer (iPad only). Simply tap and hold on the active tab!
- Stability and performance improvements.
We hope you like the update. If you do – please leave us a review!

PDF Expert now supports iPhone X and its advanced Face ID technology!
The update also fixes bugs and provides general performance improvements.
If you like the update - please leave us a review.

The update fixes bugs and provides general performance improvements.
If you like the update - please leave us a review.

The update fixes bugs and provides general performance improvements.
If you like the update - please leave us a review.

The update fixes bugs and provides general performance improvements.
If you like the update - please leave us a review.

As the holidays approach there is magic in the air, and we've managed to harness some of that magic for our latest release.
Today we're glad to present you PDF Expert 6.1.8 with a number of fixes and improvements.
The most prominent one is a new tab bar in the Landscape mode.

Usually our releases are entwined with all iOS updates. Though not always. Today we announce a farewell to iOS 9!
To unleash full power of iOS 11 within PDF Expert and provide you with the best PDF experience, we need to drop support for iOS 9.
Please update your devices to the latest iOS if you want to receive further updates of PDF Expert.

We think you’ll be pleased with the update. If you are, leave a review in the App Store.
Thank you in advance!

Happy New Year, everyone!
Let’s start 2018 with the first in this year PDF Expert 6.1.9. update, that addresses some of the issues you've reported.
May the new year be super productive for you and your family!

If you need us, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com
We love hearing from you!

Good day, folks!
Today’s update brings a number of important fixes to some minor internal bugs that have needed squashing for a good while.

We love hearing from you! Get in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Good day, everyone!
Today we’re bringing you a handful of important fixes.
The most prominent one is the fix for Dropbox sign-in issue on iOS 10 devices, that was brought to our attention by you, our dear customers.

Until next time!
If you need us earlier, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

PDF Expert gets an amazing update with a brand-new cloud file management and enhanced PDF reader!

*** Two-page view ***
Now you can view two pages of your PDFs side by side like a book or a magazine.
*** The best new way to manage files in the cloud ***
- Drag and drop files within your cloud storage, to another service (e.g. from Google Drive to Dropbox) or even into a local folder
- Find your files in the cloud faster by adding them to Favorites.
- Get an immediate preview of your cloud files with a thumbnail view. Save your time!

More great features are coming soon. If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review or recommend PDF Expert to your friends!
We’re always here for you at rdsupport@readdle.com

PDF Expert 迎来重大更新，全新网盘文件管理和更好用的 PDF 阅读体验！
*** 双页浏览 ***
就像查看杂志一样，现在您能同时查看两页页面。
*** 管理网盘文件更便捷 ***
- 将网盘里的文件拖放到其他网盘（如 Google 云端硬盘到 Dropbox）或本地文件夹。
- 将网盘文件添加到收藏，下次访问更迅速。
- 通过缩略图迅速预览网盘文件，够省事！
更多功能，敬请期待。
您若要向程序员表示感谢，请撰写评论或将 PDF Expert 推荐给亲朋好友！
如有问题，请联系我：rdsupport@readdle.com

It's Labor Day weekend here in Ukraine and we've been laboring away to clean up a few internal issues in PDF Expert.

Get your picnic blanket ready and enjoy the spring!
If you need us, you can always find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

PDF Expert 现发布大幅更新：

**最近删除文件夹**
已删除文件将保留 30 天，之后将永久删除。恢复还是删除，由您决定。

**将文件副本保存在网盘**
将 PDF 另存在网盘即可保证其数据安全、存取方便。

更多功能敬请期待。您若想对辛勤劳动的程序员表示感谢，请评价 PDF Expert，或将其推荐给您的亲朋好友！
您若急需帮助，请发邮件至 rdsupport@readdle.com

今天的更新主要包括大幅提升应用稳定性。衷心感谢中国朋友写信到 rdsupport@readdle.com 向我们反馈。

重大更新即将发布！

体验 Wi-Fi 传输，快速在 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 、PC 之间传输文件。

- 超级快，无需考虑宽带网速
- 您能批量传输任何大小的文件和文件夹
- 兼容主流文件格式
- 无需其他配置即可传输文件，适合 Mac 和 PC

我们深信这些功能将满足您的需求。您所有其他建议，请发邮件至 rdsupport@readdle.com。
尽请期待！

此次更新已修复用户报告的多数问题。
如有其他问题，请随时发送邮件给我们 rdsupport@readdle.com 。更多功能，敬请期待！

更新略为频繁，我们深感抱歉。版本 6.5.1 并未修复更新公告描述的问题。

现在，所有问题已修复！
您若需要帮助，请发邮件至 rdsupport@readdle.com

今天带来大家期待已久的功能：
- 支持 SMB 2.0！
高速文件分享，更安全的数据保护。

感谢广大用户写信到 rdsupport@readdle.com 提供反馈。
更多功能，敬请期待！

今天的更新解决谷歌登陆的问题，感谢各位将反馈发送到 rdsupport@readdle.com，帮我们排忧解难。
若没有你们，此问题无法得以修复。

更稳定的性能，更优秀的体验，尽在您最喜爱的 PDF Expert。
从此，在 iOS 12 顺畅无比！

您可随时发邮件给我们：rdsupport@readdle.com

今天的更新主要包括大幅提升应用稳定性。衷心感谢中国朋友写信到 rdsupport@readdle.com 向我们反馈。
重大更新即将发布！

您若要对辛勤劳动的程序员表示感谢，请登录商店发表评论或将 PDF Expert 推荐给亲朋好友！-:)

在新款 iPad Pro 全面屏体验 PDF Expert，更有全新 Apple Pencil 锦上添花。

PDF 在全新 iPad 上大放异彩，更快更强，视野更宽广。
全新 Apple Pencil 完美搭配全新 iPad Pro，可谓两全其美。您可通过轻点两下笔身即可撤销操作或切换常用批注工具。
尽情享用！
请随时将您的意见和建议发送到 rduspport@readdle.com，更多惊喜，敬请期待！

在新款 iPad Pro 全面屏体验 PDF Expert，更有全新 Apple Pencil 锦上添花。

PDF 在全新 iPad 上大放异彩，更快更强，视野更宽广。
您可轻点两下笔身即可使用橡皮擦或切换您最常使用的批注工具。
尽情享用！
请随时将您的意见和建议发送到 rduspport@readdle.com，更多惊喜，敬请期待！

中国的朋友们，大家好！
今天我们修复一些重要问题并提升了性能。
感谢大家将建议和意见发送到 rdsupport@readdle.com，帮助我们改善产品质量。
再次感谢大家！

再次感谢大家！

在佳节到来之际，我们在此奉上一次小幅更新！
感谢各位的意见和建议。
再次表示衷心感谢！

朋友们，圣诞节快乐！
在节日到来之际，我们及时发布更新，修复问题，提升性能，欢度佳节。

感谢大家这一年来不断发送邮件至 rdsupport@readdle.com 反馈问题。
Readdle 全体员工再次祝大家节日快乐！

恭祝大家新年快乐！
2019新年伊始，迎来 PDF Expert 6.6.7 更新，解决各位关切的问题。
祝大家阖家辛福，步步高升！

您如果需要帮助，请发送邮件至 rdsupport@readdle.com，
我们倾听您的心声。

此次更新已修复用户报告的多数问题。
如有其他问题，请随时发送邮件给我们 rdsupport@readdle.com 。更多功能，敬请期待！

PDF Expert 团队推出更新！
此次更新大幅提升性能，包括新增谷歌云端硬盘的 “与我共享”和“电脑”。
现在，iPad 和 iPhone 端的谷歌云端硬盘文件夹结构与其网页版完全一致。因此，您的全部已分享文件和文件夹在“与我共享”文件夹整洁陈列。
好棒！
请随时发送邮件至 rdsupport@readdle.com 反馈问题。更多惊喜，敬请期待。

好棒！

今天的更新修复了谷歌云端硬盘连接的问题。
感谢大家指出问题，发送邮件至 rdsupport@readdle.com 提交反馈。

敬请期待！

猪年快乐！
本周，我们小幅提升了 PDF Expert 的性能，希望您能感受到。

## 修复
- 修复高亮和文本选择工具的问题。
感谢大家不断反馈意见，我们乐意为您服务！

您若需要帮助，请随时发邮件至 rdsupport@readdle.com 联系我们。

体验全新 PDF Expert 7 - 数年来最重大更新！
此次更新的新增功能均免费。此外，您可通过订阅使用其他的专业功能。

免费新增功能：

• 全新设计
• 页面管理更科学
• 贴纸
• 改善后的引擎能在 Metal 运行
• 整合文件应用
• 搜索更智能
• 全新批注摘要

订阅制新增功能包括：

• PDF 转换：将微软办公文件和图片转换成高质量 PDF
• 自定义界面 - 将常用工具聚集于一处。
• 压缩文件 - 压缩 PDF 大小，节省空间。
• 变更或隐藏文本、添加图片和链接（若您尚未购买内购项目）。

再次提醒，专业功能针对专业人士，订阅与否，由您决定。以往功能均可免费使用，无需付费。
新增功能让 PDF 点睛向旗舰级应用迈进。

感谢您多年的支持！
我们倾听您的意见：rdsupport@readdle.com

同学们！今天的更新主要是提升应用程序的稳定性。
偶尔闪退的情况大幅减少，PDF Expert 将更加稳定。
感谢各位提出反馈和功能建议，我们乐意为您服务，不断改善 PDF Expert 的使用体验。

iOS 13 已发布，PDF 点睛现已兼容全新 iPadOS，并新增诸多功能！

## 深色模式
打开深色模式，晚间工作，同样出色。

## 笔工具用于批注图片
真实质感，笔记、绘图，前沿科技。

## 多窗口，多任务
现在，您能同时打开两张 PDF，左右对比，笔记更快。

## 高效手势
使用 iPadOS 高效手势，忘记笔记本电脑，处理 PDF 更快。

我们希望此次更新能提升您的体验！
您若需要帮助，请发送邮件至 rdsupport@readdle.com

iPhone 迎来全新阅读模式！
借助出色的阅读模式，在 iPhone 小屏幕上阅读电子书不再困难。
现在，任何包含图表，表格、运算的 PDF 电子书将自动适应 iPhone PDF 点睛的屏幕，让您注重内容和无需频繁手动缩放和滑动。
您还可根据自己的阅读喜好，调整字体大小，亮度，切换日间、夜间、纸质三种阅读模式。
即刻打开 PDF 文档，点触屏幕右下角页面图标即可感受非凡阅读体验啦！
享受阅读！
请将您对阅读模式的想法告诉我们，致函 rdsupport@readdle.com

iOS 14 已发布，PDF 点睛也是如此！
部件？手写？没错！
PDF 点睛已准备就绪，推出诸多新功能：

*** 全新部件
即刻起，您可从主屏快速跳转到最近或收藏文件和文件夹。

*** 通过 Scribble 将手写转换成文本
Scribble 自动将手写转换成打印体文本。（仅 iPad）

*** 快速定位文件夹
无需多次点触！长按返回按键即可查看并跳转到全部之前的子文件夹。

我们希望此次更新能提升您的体验。
喜爱 PDF 点睛？即刻发表评论！您的意见是我们进步的动力，让我们不断改善 PDF 点睛，再次对您表示感谢。
您若需要帮助，请致函 rdsupport@readdle.com

你好呀，建筑师。我们推出适合你的工具！
PDF 今天推出了面向专业工程人员的工具，唯一一款能让您在 PDF 处理图纸和草图的应用程序。

比例和度量工具—— 测量区域确保项目进展顺利。PDF 点睛智能检测图纸比例，帮您快速度量距离、面积、周长。
多边形和多段线形状—— 在 iPad 绘图，与客户保持沟通。使用填充图案表示不同材料，方便对方阅读。
红线工具——随时随地使用标注、云线、图章审阅图纸。

我们希望您能够喜欢此次更新。
喜爱 PDF 点睛？请给我们点个赞！您的反馈是我们持续改善 PDF 点睛的动力。
如有问题，请致函 rdsupport@readdle.com
